description: Largest decimal digit in n-th prime.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..78498, all primes < 10^6.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = vecmax(digits(prime(n))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 26 2013(Haskell)a060418 = a054055 . a000040  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 25 2015
author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 05 2001
extensions: Offset corrected to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Dec 26 2013
